Louisville_Jefferson_County.Indian Hills, Kentucky: Indian Hills is a home rule-class city along the Ohio River in Jefferson County, Kentucky, United States. The population was 2,882 as of the 2000 U.S. census. Indian Hills and the neighboring cities of Mockingbird Valley and Glenview, as well as nearby Anchorage, have been considered the most prosperous suburbs of Louisville since the mid-20th century.
